rule.description: Yandex: MBD.redis new hosts has been added to a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis shard has been added to a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis backup has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis new cluster has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis clusters has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis hosts has been deleted from a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis shard has been deleted from a cluster by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis cluster has been moved by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis new cluster from a backup has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis cluster has been rebalanced by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis cluster has been started by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis cluster has been stopped by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis cluster has been updated by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: MBD.redis master switching for a cluster has been started by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
